title: Titanic
production_studio: 20th Century Fox, Paramount Pictures, Lightstorm Entertainment
description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: Good Will Hunting
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

title: L.A. Confidential
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material Previously Produced or Published
description: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

title: Men in Black
description: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

title: As Good as It Gets
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship.

title: The Fifth Element
description: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

title: Boogie Nights
production_studio: New Line Cinema, Lawrence Gordon Productions
description: The story of a young man's adventures in the Californian pornography industry of the late 1970s and early 1980s.

title: Princess Mononoke
description: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

title: The Full Monty
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Original Musical or Comedy Score
description: Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act.

title: The Game
description: A wealthy San Francisco banker is given a mysterious gift that turns his life upside down.

title: Jackie Brown
description: A flight attendant with a criminal past gets nabbed by the ATF for smuggling. Under pressure to become an informant against the drug dealer she works for, she must find a way to secure her future without getting killed.

title: Gattaca
description: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

title: Starship Troopers
description: Humans in a fascistic, militaristic future do battle with giant alien bugs in a fight for survival.

title: Liar Liar
description: A fast-track lawyer can't lie for 24 hours due to his son's birthday wish.

title: Donnie Brasco
description: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the mafia life, at the expense of his regular one.

title: Air Force One
description: Hijackers seize the plane carrying the President of the United States and his family, but he is a former soldier and plans to fight back.

title: Face/Off
description: In order to foil a terrorist plot, an FBI agent undergoes facial transplant surgery and assumes the identity of a criminal mastermind, who then escapes custody and assumes the identity of the agent.

title: My Best Friend's Wedding
description: When a woman's long-time friend reveals he's engaged, she realizes she loves him herself and sets out to get him, with only days before the wedding.

title: The Sweet Hereafter
description: A small mountain community is devastated by a school bus accident that kills most of the town's children, and a lawyer who arrives to represent the victims' families finds himself confronting his own personal tragedy.

title: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
description: A 1960s secret agent is brought out of cryofreeze to oppose his greatest enemy in the 1990s, where his social attitudes are glaringly out of place.

title: Con Air
description: A newly-paroled ex-con and former U.S. Ranger finds himself trapped in a prisoner-transport plane when the passengers seize control.

title: Grosse Pointe Blank
description: A professional assassin has a crisis of conscience and decides to attend his high school reunion.

title: Lost Highway
description: After a bizarre encounter at a party, a jazz saxophonist is framed for the murder of his wife and sent to prison, where he inexplicably morphs into a young mechanic and begins leading a new life.

title: Chasing Amy
description: A comic book artist falls in love with a lesbian, and their relationship is complicated by his own insecurities and the disapproval of his best friend.

title: The Wings of the Dove
description: An impoverished woman who has been jilted by her wealthy lover conspires with a cynical journalist to deceive a dying heiress.

title: Grosse Pointe Blank
description: A professional assassin has a crisis of conscience and decides to attend his high school reunion.

title: The Sweet Hereafter
description: A small mountain community is devastated by a school bus accident that kills most of the town's children, and a lawyer who arrives to represent the victims' families finds himself confronting his own personal tragedy.

title: Contact
production_studio: Warner Bros., South Side Amusement Company
description: Dr. Ellie Arroway, after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of extraterrestrial intelligence, sending plans for a mysterious machine.

description: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the mafia life, at the expense of his regular one.

title: The Devil's Advocate
description: An exceptionally adept Florida lawyer is offered a job at a high-end New York City law firm with a high-end boss - the biggest opportunity of his career to date.
